verbose_text: Lu et al. reported that N enriched carbon nanotube (CNT) surfaces can enhance the reduction of iron oxides to catalytically active iron carbides and that they can increase the selectivity towards lower olefins because of their intrinsic basicity, which enhances dissociative CO adsorption and promotes the desorption of C 2 -C 4 olefins.
evidence: CNT) surfaces can enhance the reduction of iron
